A Light in the Attic

Product Description

It's hard to imagine a world without A Light in the Attic. This now-classic collection of poetry and drawings from Shel Silverstein is celebrating its 20th anniversary with this special edition. From a Girl Who Eats a Whale to the man who has a light in his attic, every poem is a gem. Shel Silverstein's humor and insight are on full display in this beloved book. It is a must-have for every library.
